package.name: StoreSwitcher 账号切换
package.shortDescription: App Store 账号快速切换 * Adds a button to switch account in App Store account page on iOS 11+.

descriptionlist.description:
## App Store 账号快速切换
- 账号界面左上角显示切换图标
- Switch between App Store accounts with ease.
- 支持 Bootstrap 环境

changelog.change:
### 1.0.5
- 转换支持 Bootstrap 环境
